title: TRUVA Turkish Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu has some vegetable-based dishes. Chef speaks English and will make dishes vegan on request including the bread (not vegan) that's served with hummus. Falafel, dolmas, dishes with spinach, etc.
streetAddress: Kanagawa-ken Yokohama-shi Kanagawa-ku Tsuruya-cho 2-24-1, Tanigawa Bldg B1F
